lines.text: Rome isn't much fun when you don't know anybody.
Didn't you bring Marge?
Don't even start! It was Tom's idea.
Tom. Tom. You're like a broken record!

[Referring to forged signatures]
What do you do for a living besides this?
Nothing. And you?
Nothing. But I have my own dough.

[Referring to Philippe]
He has his and I have other people's.
Why bother having money when you can spend other people's?
All is vanity! The rest is ash!
That's why you took my bank statements?
Exactly.
So you kill me and you're rich?
Don't miss a trick, do you?
It seems awfully complicated. You'd be caught immediately.
No necessarily. I might not look it, but I've got lots of imagination.
You don't love me.
What's your problem? My feelings for you have nothing to do with Fra Angelico!
That'd be naughty of you.
I trust you. Swear that he's not in San Francisco.
Come on, Marge!
Sorry. You're my only link to Philippe.
You'll love it here.
I hope so.
I always say, changing the curtains changes the whole room.
Marge, my love, my angel.
Marge, my love, my angel.
Take off my things.
I was just fooling around.
Those my shoes? Are you nuts?
